info.title: Sardis API
info.description: Payment execution layer for AP2/TAP agents

post.description: Create and store a new payment mandate (does not execute).

schema.title: Response List Mandates Api V2 Mandates Get

post.description: Validate a mandate without executing it.
Execute a previously created mandate.
Cancel a pending mandate.
Execute a payment mandate directly (legacy endpoint).

Execute an AP2 payment with full compliance checks.

Flow:
1. Verify mandate chain (signature, expiry, amount validation)
2. Check rate limits
3. Perform KYC verification for high-value transactions
4. Screen addresses for sanctions
5. Execute payment
6. Log compliance decisions

schema.title: Response Get Recent Transactions Api V2 Ledger Recent Get

post.description: Create a new hold (pre-authorization) on funds.

schema.title: Response List Active Holds Api V2 Holds Get

post.description: Capture (complete) a hold.
Void (cancel) a hold, releasing the funds.

schema.title: Response List Wallet Holds Api V2 Holds Wallet  Wallet Id  Get

post.description: Mark expired holds as expired. Admin endpoint.

schema.title: Response Expire Old Holds Api V2 Holds Expire Post

get.description: List all available webhook event types.

post.description: Create a new webhook subscription.

schema.title: Response List Webhooks Api V2 Webhooks Get

get.description: Get a webhook subscription by ID.

post.description: Send a test event to verify the webhook endpoint.

get.description: List delivery attempts for a webhook subscription.

schema.title: Response List Deliveries Api V2 Webhooks  Subscription Id  Deliveries Get

post.description: Rotate the webhook signing secret.
Estimate gas for a stablecoin transfer.

get.description: Get the status of a transaction.
List supported tokens for a chain.

post.description: Create a new service listing.

schema.title: Response List Services Api V2 Marketplace Services Get

post.description: Search for services.

schema.title: Response Search Services Api V2 Marketplace Services Search Post

post.description: Create a service offer.

schema.title: Response List Offers Api V2 Marketplace Offers Get

post.description: Accept an offer (provider action).
Reject an offer (provider action).
Mark an offer as completed.
Create a review for a completed offer.

schema.title: Response List Reviews Api V2 Marketplace Services  Service Id  Reviews Get

post.description: Login with username and password.
Login with username and password.
Create a new wallet for an agent.

schema.title: Response List Wallets Api V2 Wallets Get

post.description: Set spending limits for a wallet.
Deposit funds to a wallet.
Withdraw funds from a wallet.

get.description: Get wallet for a specific agent.

post.description:
Issue a new virtual card linked to a wallet.

The card is created and automatically activated.
Cards can be funded from stablecoin balances or other sources.

schema.title: Response List Cards Api V2 Cards Get

delete.description:
Cancel a card permanently.

This action cannot be undone. Any remaining balance is returned to the wallet.

post.description:
Fund a virtual card.

Transfers funds from the agent's stablecoin balance to the card.

Freeze a card to prevent transactions.

The card can be unfrozen later.
Unfreeze a previously frozen card.

schema.title: Response List Card Transactions Api V2 Cards  Card Id  Transactions Get

post.description:
Receive webhooks from card provider (Lithic).

This endpoint handles transaction events, card status changes, etc.
Create a new AI agent.

schema.title: Response List Agents Api V2 Agents Get

post.description: Bind an existing wallet to an agent.

get.description: Get current spending limits and usage for an agent.

schema.title: Response Get Agent Limits Api V2 Agents  Agent Id  Limits Get

get.description:
List all API keys for the organization.

Note: The actual key secrets are never returned.

post.description:
Create a new API key.

**Important:** The `key` field in the response is only shown once.
Store it securely - it cannot be retrieved later.

Requires: Valid API key with 'admin' or 'api_keys:create' scope.

get.description: Get details of a specific API key.

delete.description:
Revoke (deactivate) an API key.

This action cannot be undone. The key will immediately stop working.

get.description: Get information about the currently used API key.
Health check endpoint with component status.

payment_method.title: Payment Method
payment_method.description: Payment method: stablecoin, virtual_card, x402, bank_transfer

AP2PaymentExecuteRequest.title: AP2PaymentExecuteRequest
AP2PaymentExecuteRequest.description:
AP2 payment execution request with Intent+Cart+Payment bundle.

Supports multiple payment methods as per AP2's payment-agnostic design.

name.title: Name
name.description: Human-readable name for the API key
